entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with drizzle near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers in the evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then light after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
